title: Best PC microphone
author: VD
content_html: I’m looking to buy a decent mike for my PC and was wondering if anyone had any recommendations. I don’t want a DSP-USB one, unless the sound is significantly better as I’ve heard there are some volume issues. It should have a two-ear headset too. Thanks.
